Package org.openpnp.spi

Interface MachineListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MachineListener.Adapter
    public interface MachineListener
    Provides a set of callbacks called by a Machine to notify listeners of asynchronous state changes in the Machine.

    • Nested Class Summary
